p: (1) Free Fatty Acids (FFA). Five (5) grams of homogenized and sieved crude oil sample was weighed in a 250 ml conical flask. About 50-100 ml of freshly neutralized hot ethyl alcohol was added to the oil sample followed by the addition of about 1 ml of phenolphthalein indicator. The mixture was boiled for about five minutes and titrated while hot, against standard 0.1 N potassium hydroxide solution while shaking vigorously until the mixture formed a pink colour, which persists for about 15 minutes. Free fatty acid was obtained by equation (1).
